author: stas
msg: work harder to find out the location of apr-config. if found store its base
directory as it might be different from the APXS dir.

author: stas
msg: revert the test code to use : shared attribute, and in order to avoid
compilation problems with perl < 5.8.x do the skipping in the client part
(the reason for not using threads::shared::share() is that it doesn't quite
work unless 'use threads' was loaded in the BEGIN {} block)

author: stas
msg: - now requiring 5.8.x/ithreads for threaded mpms (now doing the check
against the mpm, rather than OS name)

author: stas
msg: move all the requirement checkings (perl/apr) into one sub
